content: 1 single_crochet 3 double_crochet 2 single_crochet 2 double_crochet 9 single_crochet 2 double_crochet single_crochet x 4 close the round and pull through color c cut b unless you want your bag to be higher/deeper then concnue with rounds 38 -49 on pages 27 and 28 52 single_crochet 28 double_crochet the border crochet in both loops of the sctches from here onwards except for the slip_stitch at the end of each round the 1st st is made in the next st aler the chain 1 the last st is made in both loops of the same st as the slip_stitch and chain 1 were made in round 1 c for placement of the last single_crochet see the photo below chain 1 80 single_crochet close the round with a slip_stitch in the bl of the 1st single_crochet concnue with color c 80 single_crochet round 2 c repeat round 1 round 3 c the 8 loop holes for the cord are made in this round the loop holes chain 2 and 2 skipped st s are located above 2 double_crochet of round 37 as in the photo below if you are a pght crocheter consider to chain 3 instead of chain 2 chain 1 4 single_crochet chain 2 skip 2 st 9 single_crochet chain 2 skip 2 st 3 single_crochet x 4 close the round 64 single_crochet 8 ch2-space © bokky bag by yvonne van zijl @bokkyshome 2023 22 round 4 c chain 1 3 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the next ch2-space 9 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the next ch2-space 4 single_crochet x 4 close the round and this cme slip_stitch in both loops of the 1st st of the round 80 single_crochet round 5 c chain 1 this chain 1 counts as a st 79 single_crochet fasten_off and close the round with an invisible join over the starcng chain 1 with a darning needle insert the yarn end under the 1st single_crochet of the round as in the 1st photo below then insert the yarn end between the loops of the last single_crochet and between the loops of the starcng chain 1 as in the 2nd photo below do not pull the st closed too cght 80 single_crochet the main structure of the bag is now ready i added a cord with a li le ball on each end the cord funccons both as a closure and as a carrying strap feel free to make a closure and handles to your own liking a ball use any color you like i used color b use hooksize 3 mm the ball is crocheted in conpnuous rounds if you like use a sptchmarker to mark the 1st st of each round concerning increases 2 single_crochet in the same st preferably crochet the 1st single_crochet in the bl only and the 2nd single_crochet in both loops of the same st decrease insert your hook in the fl only of the next 2 st s see 1st photo below yo pull through 2 loops on the hook
